projects.title: Travel Agent
projects.subtitle: Full-Stack Development
projects.shortDescription: An intelligent travel planning application combining real-time flight data, hotel information, and weather forecasts with AI-powered recommendations. Processes 10,000+ API calls efficiently with advanced caching.
projects.fullDescription: Travel Agent is a comprehensive travel planning application that leverages multiple APIs and AI technology to help users plan their perfect trip. The application features an interactive trip planning form with location swap functionality, budget planning capabilities, and real-time data from Amadeus (flights/hotels) and OpenWeather APIs. Powered by OpenAI for personalized recommendations, the app uses Promise.all for parallel data fetching, IndexedDB caching for airport codes and city coordinates, and session storage for efficient handling of large trip plans. Built with React 19 and React Router 7, it implements lazy-loaded routes and follows a mobile-first responsive design approach. The application efficiently handles over 10,000 API calls through intelligent caching strategies, reducing redundant requests and improving user experience.
highlights: Real-time flight, hotel, and weather data integration
Parallel API data fetching for optimal performance
Mobile-first responsive design with lazy-loaded routes

projects.title: Vanlife
projects.subtitle: Front-End Development
projects.shortDescription: A React-based marketplace for van rentals featuring secure authentication, host management dashboard, and mobile-optimized responsive design. Streamlines the van rental process with intuitive navigation and real-time data management.
projects.fullDescription: Vanlife is a comprehensive single-page application marketplace for van rentals built to demonstrate advanced React Router patterns and full-stack integration. The application enables users to browse a catalog of vans with detailed listings and provides a secure authentication system for host access. The host dashboard includes income tracking, review monitoring, and rental management capabilities, streamlining van rental management with 50% fewer clicks compared to traditional platforms. Built with React 18.2.0 and React Router v6.4.3, the project demonstrates advanced concepts including loader-based data fetching, protected routes with authentication guards, and nested routing structures for complex layouts. Firebase Firestore handles data storage while MirageJS provides mock authentication. The application follows a modular CSS architecture and features a mobile-optimized responsive interface built with React Icons for UI elements.
highlights: Loader-based data fetching with React Router
Nested routing structures for complex layouts
Host dashboard with income tracking and reviews
Firebase Firestore integration for data persistence

projects.title: Mind Map - Learning Tracker
projects.subtitle: Full-Stack Development
projects.shortDescription: A contemporary learning visualization application enabling users to create interactive mind maps for tracking educational progress.
projects.fullDescription: Mind Map is a modern learning tracker that helps users visualize and organize their educational journey through interactive mind maps. Built with React 19 and powered by Supabase, the application features topic management with customizable color coding, draggable concept nodes, and relationship tracking. The project demonstrates modern React development practices with a feature-based architectural approach, including custom hooks, component composition, and performance optimization. Key features include integrated search and filtering, keyboard navigation shortcuts, guest access for exploring functionality, and mobile-responsive design. The codebase underwent systematic refactoring across five phases, implementing React Query for server state management, comprehensive testing with Vitest, and code quality automation with Prettier and Husky.
highlights: Feature-based architecture with colocated components and hooks
Interactive draggable mind map nodes with visual relationships
Supabase integration for authentication and database services
React Query for optimized server state management
Code quality automation with Prettier and Husky
